def has_switch(light: item):
    symbol has_switch = exists o: item : is_remote_control(o) and close(o, light)
    return has_switch

behavior switch_on_light(light: item):
    body:
        if has_switch(light):
            bind remote: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote) and close(remote, light)
            achieve_once inhand(remote)
            achieve is_on(light)
